meanings.definition: A sudden loud noise or explosion.
meanings.sent1: The thunder made a loud bams outside.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks created a series of colorful bams in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The bams from the fireworks startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The bams of the fireworks painted the night sky with light.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected bams of thunder shook the windows.

meanings.sent1: He always carries a lot of bams in his wallet.
meanings.sent2: She earned a good amount of bams from her hard work.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his pockets were overflowing with bams.
meanings.sent4: Money talks, and bams can make things happen.
meanings.sent5: The shiny bams in the cash register caught her eye.

meanings.sent1: He bams the door shut when he's angry.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally bams her elbow on the table.
meanings.sent3: The chef bams the dough to make it smooth.
meanings.sent4: The waves bams against the rocks relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The hammer bams the nail into the wood.
